Reviews.Title: Good camera for daytime use
Reviews.Author: Tom S. "Tom S."
Reviews.Content: I was quite surprised how nice the image quality is during the day-time. Also, the size is a big plus. The downside is that it performs quite badly in low light - it really gives a very noisy picture, to the point of triggering the dvr motion sensitivity continuously.Still, for the money, and with the caveats mentioned, a solid buy.PS: Does anyone know if it is possible to replace the lens, and if so, what mount this is?

Reviews.Title: Not as good as expected
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: Arrived very fast and in good packaging.Not sure it is 520 TVL though as resolution appears lower than other 380 TVL cameras.Buyers need to be aware it is a 5V device, my other cameras operate on a 12V line, this will kill this camera if connected.Not suitable for outdoor use as camera is not sealed in any way.On the good side, the colors seem true.

Reviews.Title: Wrong power supply; two of three not working; no service
Reviews.Author: Norbert Simonis
Reviews.Content: I ordered three of these.  One of the three came with a power supply that had too small of a male connector.  Not realizing that the DVC was different from my other cameras, I used one of those power supplies and apparently burned out the camera since the DVC was 10 instead of 5.  The company did not respond to my e-mail about the problem.  The second one quit shortly after getting it going.  I'm pleased with the third one, but I paid the price of three to get one that works.

Reviews.Title: Save your money!
Reviews.Author: TVLOCO
Reviews.Content: I have cameras with 380 lines of resolution that look better than this piece of junk.It's also closer to black & white than it is to COLOR.

ProductInfo.Features:
With Light Weight & Mini Size, Easy to Install Into Covert Narrow Space and Slim Tube, etc. without Causing Unnecessary Damage On Object Surface.
Miniature Covert Shape, Light Weight, 3.7mm F2.0/55 Degrees View Angle, Power Supply, Input: AC 100V ~ 240V, 50 ~ 60 Hz, Output: DC 5V, 1000mA.
Image Sensor: 1/3" CMOS Image Sensor. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TVL. TV System: NTSC. Effective Pixels: 786(H) x 576(V).
No Audio, Video Output: 1.0V p ~ p/75ohm. Adopting Generation IV CMOS Image Sensor and DSP Chip, Offering True Color and HD Video.
Internal Synchronization, No Auto Gain Control, No Back Light Compensation, No White Balance control, 0.45 Y Characteristic.
ProductInfo.Name: Intsun® MD900D 520 TVL 1/3" CMOS Image Sensor Indoor Covert Pinhole Security Camera, 3.7mm F2.0/55 Degrees View Angle Lens, Hidden In Home or Office for Spy Surveillance
